attributes.action: Get the LIMP-WRISTED UK Govt get off its fat ass and take back our country from the brink of Sharia
attributes.additional_details:
Instead of spending our tax money on "protecting" HATE PREACHERS such as Choudrey and his ilk Stop them from preaching their vile "demands" in OUR towns n cities! If I was to go round doing as they do against Islam I would be arrested in 5 mins flat AND locked up (against my human rights)
This is our country it DOES NOT belong to Islam nor shall it ever!!
CAMERON/CLEGG STOP BEING SO DAMN SPINELESS AND DO SOMETHING ABOUT THIS!!
